channel.title: Emulation on Arrans github.io
channel.description: Recent content in Emulation on Arrans github.io

item.title: rommapp/romm
item.description: A beautiful, powerful, self-hosted rom manager and player.

item.title: jaromaz/MacintoshPi
item.description: MacintoshPi is a project that allows running full-screen versions of Apple’s Mac OS 7, Mac OS 8 and Mac OS 9 with sound, active online connection and modem emulation under Raspberry Pi.

item.title: mihaip/infinite-mac
item.description: A classic Mac loaded with everything you’d want
